charinfo.name: Shizune
charinfo.description: The apprentice to Tsunade, and the niece of Dan, Shizune is a calm, practical but loyal ninja of Konoha's medical squad. Shizune is agile and quick, able to attack continually when not using her powerful medical jutsu to heal her allies.

abilities.name: Prepared Needle Shot
abilities.description: Shizune shoots hidden needles at one enemy dealing 15 damage to them.

abilities.name: Poison Mist
abilities.description: Shizune breathes a poison cloud on one enemy who takes 10 affliction damage for 3 turns. This skill may not be used on an enemy currently affected.

abilities.name: Resuscitation Regeneration
abilities.description: Using this advanced healing technique Shizune heals one ally for 35 health and removes all enemy afflictions from them.

abilities.name: Shizune Dodge
abilities.description: This skill makes Shizune invulnerable for 1 turn.
